definition: station/to stand/to halt/to stop/branch of a company or organization/website

sentences.english: The maintenances of the radio sites affect greatly the quality of service of the mobile phone network.
sentences.chinese: 基站维护对提高移动网络的运营质量具有重要意义。

sentences.english: Samsung used its existing Mobile WiMAX base station for the demo.
sentences.chinese: 在演示中，三星使用了其现有的移动WiMAX基站。

sentences.english: Main applications for 3G, Tower Mounted Amplifier, Base Stations.
sentences.chinese: 主要用于3G电调天线，塔放和基站设备。

sentences.english: The unique identifier for a particular cell in a mobile network.
sentences.chinese: 移动网络中每个蜂窝基站的唯一标识码。

sentences.english: The huge part of populated area of Russia is covered with base stations.
sentences.chinese: 俄罗斯的人口居住的大部分地区都有了基站覆盖。

sentences.english: PKE system source code, including base station and transponder code, including the circuit diagram.
sentences.chinese: PKE系统源码，包括基站及应答器源码，含电路图。

sentences.english: Single base station CORS system is popularized gradually in the fields of surveying in towns.
sentences.chinese: 单基站CORS系统在城镇各测量领域得到逐步普及。

sentences.english: Each base station can support up to 432 calls.
sentences.chinese: 每个基站最多可支持432个电话呼叫。

sentences.english: In the base station, the electrical mm-wave signal was generated by O/E conversion.
sentences.chinese: 在基站中通过光电转换器产生电毫米波。

sentences.english: Extension to space-time speed estimation at the base station in macrocells is also provided.
sentences.chinese: 另外，也提供了在微小区基站的空时速度估计方法。

sentences.english: The essence of the base-station is computing and processing infrastructure for concurrent multi-signal stream.
sentences.chinese: 基站的本质是并发多无线信号流的计算处理设备。

sentences.english: It works by forcing mobile phones and base stations to continually change frequencies.
sentences.chinese: 它工作的原理是让手机和基站不断的改变频率。

sentences.english: This group number is added to the paging message sent to the BTS.
sentences.chinese: 这组号码被添加到发送给无线基站的页面调度信息中。

sentences.english: This could make radio contact with mobile phone base stations.
sentences.chinese: 这样能量就可以与手机基站取得无线电联系。

sentences.english: A base station represents a couple of iron boxes locked inside a well-conditioned room.
sentences.chinese: 基站，两个铁柜子锁在一间装有空调的房子里。

sentences.english: The content source is configured to provide the content to a base station.
sentences.chinese: 内容源被配置成向基站提供内容。

pinyin: yi2 dong4 tong1 xin4 wang3 luo4

definition: China Telecom (Chinese company providing mobile phone service)
operator (of a power station, transport network etc)/carrier (telecommunications etc)
a power station/an electricity generating plant
